Title: Blazor Basics: 9 Best Practices for Building Blazor Web Apps
Description: This post shares nine best practices for building Blazor web applications based on real-world experience.

Title: Windows Terminal Preview 1.21 Release
Description: Windows Terminal is back with another preview release! Windows Terminal Preview 1.21 introduces long-awaited features like Buffer Restore and fontfall back as well as new experimental features like Scratchpad and the ability to load up an image as a texture. Thereâ€™s also a LOT MORE stuff so check out the rest of this blog post to learn more!

Title: Fast Search and Replace in Large Number of Files: A Practical Guide
Description: This is a guide, written at an intermediate level, to performing high-speed search and replace operations across thousands of files in C# using advanced techniques such as memory-mapped files, asynchronous processing, and user-friendly interfaces with modal progress dialogs.
